Positive Punkte:

Die Melitta Easy ‚Äì Filterkaffeemaschine ist eine einfache und praktikable Kaffeemaschine, mit der man sich schnell und einfach einen guten Kaffee zubereiten kann. title: Makes a great cup of coffee.
body:
Positives first: this machine makes a great cup of coffee, and it stays hot for quite a while in the thermos. I wanted a smaller machine without bells and whistles but capable of making properly hot coffee, and this one ticked that box. It's quick and quiet. The automatic switch-off after 15 minutes makes sense; there is no need to stay on longer because there is no 'warm hold plate'; coffee stays warm in the thermos. The detachable swing filter with drip stop also makes life easy; however, detaching it is not easy and always makes me worry the plastic pin will break off sooner or later. This brings me to the downsides: the machine itself feels a bit flimsy, being made of light plastic, but the 1050W is absolutely sufficient to make a hot cup of coffee, which makes up for that. My main gripe is with the size of the swing filter. The suggested 1x4 coffee filter size fits the filter but cannot hold enough coffee without spilling over. Or at least not for the strength we prefer. We use approximately 13 grams of ground coffee/250ml water. Filling the reservoir to 6 large cups (750ml) gets the coffee up the rim of the filter, sometimes even spilling over. The average recommended amount of ground coffee/250ml is 15 grams. I haven't tried using the recommended amount of ground coffee for a full pot (1L), but I can see how that would make the coffee grinds go over the rim and end up in the pot.
Still, it took a few tries with other brands to find what I needed (with a lot of brands the coffee is not hot, or the machine is noisy and/or taking forever to get the job done) and find that this is an excellent coffee maker. I probably would buy it again.
